name: Prime Advertising
tagline: Advertising Agency in Richmond Hill, Ontario
description: Founded in 1987, Prime Advertising has provided its clients with insightful marketing strategy that drives result-oriented and cost-effective advertising campaigns. We serve a wide range of industries including automotive, consumer packaged goods, financial, healthcare, real estate, retail and non-profit. At Prime Advertising, we stay on top of these market trends and as a result, our clients benefit from our strategic insights.
